title: Blisszi
author: Blisszi
content: This is sad to share, a dude who lives in the neighborhood was a big time bitcoin guru who mentor many others but failed take good care of himself, earlier yesterday he was confirmed death in his house but a doctor confirmed he has been attending to hospital checked up lately and he has an issues of not eating proper balance diet, yet he smokes heavy and over worked his body system which has damage his internal lungs.Really all the bitcoin wallet gone, I was asking myself what life is like not eating your labor.You don't have to live this way, your body is very important take good of yourself, eat the money you work so hard, chop the money you're making from bitcoin. Once in a while go to clinic and have your body check up, someone can look healthy but very ill, when you're alive you can achieved whatever, don't work too hard and forget to take good care of your body. Omoh chop the money. Don't be a workaholic without being chopaholic, enjoy your money while you're alive ok

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Life is short and yes we need to enjoy our hard work money. If one our motivate to work not for enjoying the money and then for what we work.Health is always a priority even tho our work mostly in front of a computer.

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: Does that mean he had no family? No wife and children to live his bitcoin to? That's a waste.I wonder how much of the total supply is really gone forever. Some researchers say that 3-4 million, but since we are losing bitcoiners to diseases and accidents every day, that number could be much bigger. This story is for me something more than just a reminder to take care of my health, but also a reminder that our wealth means nothing if we don't have anyone to share it with and take over when we're gone.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Why are you working so hard for money when you won't take care of yourself? Mostly your health, it's so sadden the guy is dead, but this should sound as a warning to any member that would read this today, we are not saying you should not invest your money, or you should lavish your money, all what we are saying is that take care of yourself both mentally and otherwise, incase of smoking, if you are a smoker, try to get that specified toothpaste for smokers, and drugs that would help your liver, eat good food and take more of fruits too.(Na who dey alive dey enjoy money oo) that's my say ....

Omoh chop the money. Don't be a workaholic without being chopaholic, enjoy your money while you're alive okYou seem to have laid emphasis on 'chop your money'. I mean, I don't disagree with you in anyway, after all, what is all work and no play, it makes Jack a dull boy. Dull all round both in mind, health and pocket.I have always been a fan of not over working myself, mostly when I weigh the output of the stress on my body. It isn't just worth it to work so much, while ignoring good diet, exercise, rest and then pay a visit to the Doctor to spend the money on health. Bitcoin is good investment but if anyone gets into it and sees he is loosing sleep over it or not taking care of themselves properly, it would not be a good idea to continue in that manner. Health is wealth. Enjoy your money and live a good life. It is just this one we got.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: There are alot of people that are just like that, they don’t seem to enjoy spending money they see it as waste of resources, they don’t even bother to eat good food or spend so much on themselves I know to some people it’s natural thats how they just are but to me if you can’t spend money then what is the essence of working hard to get the money. I know someone who is just exactly like that here he doesn’t like buying clothes or things for himself he is not even bothered about what he is wearing and his children always complain of him not giving them money so i ask myself if you can’t spend on yourself and on your family then whats the use of the money.This is really not ideal your health should really come before anything else because health is wealth.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Blisszi on February 18, 2023, 01:06:12 PMThis is sad to share, a dude who lives in the neighborhood was a big time bitcoin guru who mentor many others but failed take good care of himself, earlier yesterday he was confirmed death in his house but a doctor confirmed he has been attending to hospital checked up lately and he has an issues of not eating proper balance diet, yet he smokes heavy and over worked his body system which has damage his internal lungs.Really all the bitcoin wallet gone, I was asking myself what life is like not eating your labor.You don't have to live this way, your body is very important take good of yourself, eat the money you work so hard, chop the money you're making from bitcoin. Once in a while go to clinic and have your body check up, someone can look healthy but very ill, when you're alive you can achieved whatever, don't work too hard and forget to take good care of your body. Omoh chop the money. Don't be a workaholic without being chopaholic, enjoy your money while you're alive okYou don't necessarily need money to live a good and healthy life. That dude killed himself due to heavy smoking and lack of rest and not because he was not eating balanced diet. Our body don't need much food like people consume. Sometimes people feel that you need to consume plenty of fish, meat, milk and do onto be healthy. But they fail to understand that taking plenty of water, fruits and vegetables helps the body even more than heavy food.Constant medical checkup is very important but I have observed that some persons have phobia for hospitals. They don't just like visiting physicians. Those kind of people are usually forced to seek medical attention. We must ensure we seek medical help when necessary.For two weeks now I have not been feeling fine and I decided to see a doctor today. After much examination, he prescribed some drugs that I took home. I was too tired to check and take the drugs so undecided to take a nap. After about two hours sleep I discovered that all the symptoms I had have disappeared. I am now feeling very strong. It was then I realized that what I needed was rest and not drugs because I have not had a good sleep for the past two weeks because of work. Sometimes sicknesses don't need medicines, few minutes of rest can be just the solution one needs.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: All I can see here is his bad living habit. He probably died due to his excessive intake of alcohol and also smoking and the fact that he didn't take the correct nutrients needed by his body to help fight or repair the damage caused by the alcohol and cigarettes only just hasten the process. And for him to have gotten to that stage without getting any advice or not having any relatives to look after him only tells me that either he wasn't close to his family members or they don't give a shit about him and if the latter is the case then the fact that he overworked himself his now understood. He has to do the jobs to settle his bills and some other stuffs he might be needing.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: May his soul rest in peace. Yes, health is everything. People like him who used to spend all day on their computers have some serious health issues. You must take some time for workout, spend money on eating healthy diet and hang out with friends once a week. These will keep body and mind healthy. A lot of us here lead this kind of life, we have also have to take care of our-self, it is a lesson for people who don't prioritize physical and mental health.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: It's a lesson to learn here.We should always prioritize our health as a wealth over our work, yes we work hard for our future but it's all wasted if we can't use them in the future and the worst fact is if no one knows our wallet and it belongs to an unrecoverable Bitcoin. Quote from: pixie85 on February 18, 2023, 02:59:42 PMI wonder how much of the total supply is really gone forever. Some researchers say that 3-4 million, but since we are losing bitcoiners to diseases and accidents every day, that number could be much bigger. I read this, and it says 20-25% of all Bitcoins that have been mined are lost/unrecoverable Bitcoin which is estimated between 3.78 million and 4.79 million.  It will continue increasing every year.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: A wise person knows the balance between enjoy life today and saving for the future. And to find this balance one should also take into account their current wealth. If you are a millionaire, you can easily treat yourself to some luxury item that costs thousands of dollars occasionally. Or spend dozens of dollars on some premium good every day. But if you aren't rich, but just have some savings, like $100,000 or so, it wouldn't be wise to chase such luxury just because you can. Because if you will be spending like a millionaire, you will become broke rather fast.What this means for Bitcoiners is that they should take some profits during bull markets and enjoy life. You are not breaking your HODL if you sold 0.5% of your coins to make a gift for yourself if that gift will greatly improve your life, like a new phone or a new PC.

comments.author: Fuso.hp
comments.body: First of all, I pray to God for his recovery. Health is the root of all happiness, if our body is not healthy then we cannot do any work with repentance and no self-satisfaction will come from any work. And you have presented another point whether he smokes a lot we all know smoking is very harmful to health smoking can cause cancer. Since he is sick, he should now pray to God for recovery and seek medical advice.

He needs money to survive in any situation. If you look carefully, you will see that money is everything in people's daily activities. But why is this money needed? Money is needed only to keep the human body healthy and to function fully in life. If you only run after money and don't satisfy your physical needs then money has no value. Money with which you can keep your life healthy is basically your money. So use the money for your needs. A person's own life is the most important that one should learn to value. Money is worthless if you die.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Blisszi on February 18, 2023, 01:06:12 PM<...>enjoy your money while you're alive okFor me the ideal is to maintain a balance. If you save, and invest, it's because you believe in the future, it's because you think you're going to live long enough to enjoy those savings and investments in the future. On the other hand, if you believe that you will not last much longer, you would normally spend more. As you don't know when you're going to die, for me the ideal is to maintain a certain level of savings and spending, to enjoy your money, as well as making sure that if you die the people you love inherit what you've saved. In the case you mention the lost bitcoins make ours more valuable.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Feels sad with that its part of the life that's the reason why if you have the capability to enjoy every time you have better to do it so, that guy already have the chance but I guess still he focus on earnings continuously for the future, its not all about the money every time if you have time to investment with the bitcoin and other assets better to invest at your health too because you cant enjoy those hard earnings of you if you didn't manage your self correctly too.

comments.author: Djan18
comments.body: This is a very important part, you need to please yourself, be able to buy yourself gifts, you can not devalue your work
